content: small sample of your knitting where you 1 set of 5mm us8 100cm/40 count the stitches and row and check them circular knitting needles against the measurements cm/in given 1 sewing needle in the pattern if you get more stitches/ row than the pattern s gauge it means your knitting is tighter if you get fewer stitches/row than the pattern your knitting is looser sometimes it works to knit tighter or looser to compensate 3 5mm us4 1x1 rib stitch 10 cm/4 = 28 stitches 10 cm/4 = 30 row 5mm us8 stocking stitch 10 cm/4 = 17 stitches 10 cm/4 = 25 row you can find all techniques on page 20 pssst remember that you must not copy our patterns and sell or even give them away for free in accordance with copyright law 10 #woolandthegang eng how to make your elliot sweater your sweater is made up of four pieces a 5 decrease row cast off 4 4 5 7 back a front and two sleeves you will stitches knit to the end of your row knit each piece before sewing your pieces 74 80 87 94 stitches together and finishing knitting your neck trim 6 decrease row cast off 4 4 5 7 stitches purl to the end of your row back 70 76 82 87 stitches 1 with 3 5mm us4 circular needles 7 decrease row knit 2 stitches make cast on 92 100 114 128 stitches a left-leaning decrease knit to the using the long-tail cast on technique last 4 stitches of your row make a right-leaning decrease knit 2 stitches 2 starting with a wrong side row work 68 74 80 85 stitches in 1x1 rib stitch until your piece measures 12 5cm/4 9 from the cast 8 purl 1 row on edge approx 37 row you must work an uneven number of row 9 repeat steps 7 and 8 a further 3 3 3 4 times 62 68 74 77 3 decrease row with 5mm us8 stitches circular needles knit 6 4 4 11 stitches hmake a right-leaning 10 decrease row knit 2 stitches make decrease knit 4 4 3 2 stitches h a left-leaning decrease knit to the repeat the section inside the stars last 4 stitches of your row make a h to the last 2 0 0 9 stitches right-leaning decrease knit 2 stitches of the row knit 2 0 0 9 stitches 60 66 72 75 stitches 78 84 92 101 stitches 11 starting with a purl row work 3 row 4 starting with a purl row work in in stocking stitch stocking stitch until your piece measures 27 5cm/10 8 from the 12 repeat steps 7 to 11 a further 3 cast on edge approx a further 37 times 30 36 42 39 stitches row your last row must be a wrong side row 13 repeat steps 7 and 8 a further 1 3 5 3 time s 28 30 32 33 now you will start to shape
